name: Santa Claus Calls
description:
Ho ho ho !!!
Santa Claus calls you in the real.

Make your children happy and amazed by allowing them to call from Santa’s. You can prank your child to speak with Santa and give him their Christmas Wish List of toys for this New Year 2020.

# INSTRUCTIONS
◆ Enter the name something like Santa Claus or Father Christmas.
◆ Select listed Santa clips and you can also create your own.
◆ Press on “Get Call Now!” button and Santa will call you at a specified time.
◆ Record the call and you can share the same with your friends.
